entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update net7.0 TFM references to net8.0 #66930
  • Navigation to errors in files generated by a source generator in Roslyn from build output doesn't work in VS #66928
  • CS8602 Nullable warning is missing #66921
  • The analyzer assembly references version '4.6.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.5.0.0' #66918
  • New APIs for "Primary Constructors" #66914
  • API proposal for "Using Alias to any Type" #66913

Closed

  • Background analysis performance improvements #66714
    17.6
  • Visual Studio 17.4 Incorrect Enforcing of New Breaking Change in Earlier C# Versions #66646
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Program.cs #66931
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add 'ExpandValueTuple' as a misc symbol display flag #66929
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide access to F# integration tests #66926
    Area-IDE
  • Clean with authority #66925
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize checks in AnalyzerExecutor #66923
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use WhereAsArray to avoid allocations in all/none cases #66922
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow LSP code action requests to set the (new) AllowGenerateInHiddenCode option #66917
    Area-IDE
  • Hoist address-of operators across await boundaries #66915
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Address PROTOTYPE comments for "Primary Constructors" #66865
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [PERF] Remove all partial analysis state tracking in CompilationWithAnalyzers #66750
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66920
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66916
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move the 'make method async' fixer down to shared layer #66863
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #66912
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66911
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Fix OnInitialized #66747
    Area-IDE
  • Thread blocking issue - freeze linked documents #66904
    Area-IDE
  • Improve 'introduce variable for expression' when using tuples #66909
    Area-IDE
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Avoid loading DiaSymReader unless Windows PDB is actually read #66901
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Fix workspace pull diagnostics #66886
    Area-IDE
  • Push on Restore bug #66864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix SymbolDisplay to use 'Operator' kind when producing the display for an operator symbol #66880
    Area-Compilers
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Include nullability informtion in QuickInfo when invoked on 'var' #66877
    Area-IDE
  • Disable spell checker for integration tests #66000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
